titleStmt.title: The royalist's defence vindicating the King's proceedings in the late warre made against him, clearly discovering, how and by what impostures the incendiaries of these distractions have subverted the knowne law of the land, the Protestant religion, and reduced the people to an unparallel'd slavery.
titleStmt.author: Dallison, Charles, d. 1669.

titleStmt.title: The royalist's defence vindicating the King's proceedings in the late warre made against him, clearly discovering, how and by what impostures the incendiaries of these distractions have subverted the knowne law of the land, the Protestant religion, and reduced the people to an unparallel'd slavery.
titleStmt.author: Dallison, Charles, d. 1669.

notesStmt.note: Written by Charles Dallison. Cf. BM.
